name: Mysterious Creatures The Compendium
description:
***This game was made in 4 weeks for the SVGS Christmas Jam 2021 and as such contains references to SANTA and CHRISTMAS. You have been warned.***

MYSTERIOUS CREATURES THE COMPENDIUM is a 30-minute monster collecting RPG made with love in RPG Maker VX Ace.

  • Embark on a not very epic journey to do something-or-other in a world overrun by mysterious creatures.
  • Catch creatures and fight alongside them to catch more creatures and also fight alongside those creatures.
  • State-of-the-art graphics crafted in MS Paint XP edition using only the default colours.

The game comes as an executable archive which will extract the actual game to a folder of your choice. Windows only.

If you enjoy the game I'd love to hear your feedback. Also tell your friends. Or don't.

Also the game was originally intended to be much longer, which you will probably notice when playing the game. I might come back to it, but I have some other more serious ideas for games I want to try first. Don't hold your breath. Or do.
